snippet: American military police officers handcuffed three South Koreans in a dispute over a parking violation last week, inciting protests from civic groups.
abstract: Gen James D Thurman apologizes for American service members manhandling of three South Koreans during dispute over a parking violation; Pyeongtaek police are investigating the circumstances, including whether the Americans have the right to enforce parking regulations outside the United States Air Force's Osan Air Base.
lead_paragraph: American military police officers handcuffed three South Koreans in a dispute over a parking violation last week, inciting protests from civic groups.

headline.seo: U.S. General Apologizes Over Handcuffing of Koreans
headline.main: U.S. General Apologizes for Dispute in Seoul
headline.print_headline: U.S. General Apologizes For Dispute In Seoul

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
